com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.mojo

Class AbstractLDAPMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.mojo.AbstractLDAPMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatLogger, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DumpMojo, LoadMojo

    public abstract class AbstractLDAPMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
implements FormatLogger
    This is the abstract base class for all Mojos in this the ldap-maven-plugin plugin. It defines the properties for the LDAP directory server connection and provides a method to connect to the LDAP directory server.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        protected final com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPConnection connect()
                                                       throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Connect to the LDAP directory server. The connection attempt will be retried connectionRetries times and the connection time is set to connectionTimeout.
        Returns:
        The connection object.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - If the connection to the LDAP directory server failed.
